recipes.title: Spaghetti Bolognese
recipes.description: A classic Italian pasta dish with a rich meat sauce.

recipes.title: Chicken Curry
recipes.description: A spicy and flavorful chicken curry with a coconut milk base.

recipes.title: Beef Tacos
recipes.description: Mexican-style beef tacos with fresh salsa and avocado.

recipes.title: Kabuli Pulao
recipes.description: Qabeli palaw is a variety of pilaf made in Afghanistan. The core ingredients are steamed rice mixed with caramelized carrots and dry raisins as well as marinated lamb meat.
